description: Resource schema for a Redshift-managed VPC endpoint.

VpcSecurityGroup.description: Describes the members of a VPC security group.

Status.description: The status of the VPC security group.
Status.markdownDescription:
The status of the VPC security group.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

VpcSecurityGroupId.description: The identifier of the VPC security group.
VpcSecurityGroupId.markdownDescription:
The identifier of the VPC security group.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

VpcSecurityGroup.markdownDescription:
Describes the members of a VPC security group.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

PrivateIpAddress.description: The IPv4 address of the network interface within the subnet.
PrivateIpAddress.markdownDescription:
The IPv4 address of the network interface within the subnet.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

AvailabilityZone.markdownDescription:
The Availability Zone.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

SubnetId.markdownDescription:
The subnet identifier.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

NetworkInterfaceId.markdownDescription:
The network interface identifier.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

NetworkInterface.markdownDescription:
Describes a network interface.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

EndpointName.markdownDescription:
The name of the endpoint.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^(?=^[a-z][a-z0-9]*(-[a-z0-9]+)*$).{1,30}$  
Update requires: Replacement

VpcSecurityGroupIds.description: A list of vpc security group ids to apply to the created endpoint access.

items.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

VpcSecurityGroupIds.markdownDescription:
A list of vpc security group ids to apply to the created endpoint access.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

ResourceOwner.description: The AWS account ID of the owner of the cluster.
ResourceOwner.markdownDescription:
The AWS account ID of the owner of the cluster.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^\d{12}$  
Update requires: Replacement

SubnetGroupName.description: The subnet group name where Amazon Redshift chooses to deploy the endpoint.
SubnetGroupName.markdownDescription:
The subnet group name where Amazon Redshift chooses to deploy the endpoint.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^(?=^[a-zA-Z0-9-]+$).{1,255}$  
Update requires: Replacement

ClusterIdentifier.description: A unique identifier for the cluster. You use this identifier to refer to the cluster for any subsequent cluster operations such as deleting or modifying. All alphabetical characters must be lower case, no hypens at the end, no two consecutive hyphens. Cluster name should be unique for all clusters within an AWS account
ClusterIdentifier.markdownDescription:
A unique identifier for the cluster. You use this identifier to refer to the cluster for any subsequent cluster operations such as deleting or modifying. All alphabetical characters must be lower case, no hypens at the end, no two consecutive hyphens. Cluster name should be unique for all clusters within an AWS account

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Update requires: Replacement

EndpointStatus.markdownDescription:
The status of the endpoint.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

VpcEndpoint.description: The connection endpoint for connecting to an Amazon Redshift cluster through the proxy.

VpcId.description: The VPC identifier that the endpoint is associated.
VpcId.markdownDescription:
The VPC identifier that the endpoint is associated.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

NetworkInterfaces.description: One or more network interfaces of the endpoint. Also known as an interface endpoint.
NetworkInterfaces.markdownDescription:
One or more network interfaces of the endpoint. Also known as an interface endpoint.

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

VpcEndpointId.description: The connection endpoint ID for connecting an Amazon Redshift cluster through the proxy.
VpcEndpointId.markdownDescription:
The connection endpoint ID for connecting an Amazon Redshift cluster through the proxy.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

VpcEndpoint.markdownDescription:
The connection endpoint for connecting to an Amazon Redshift cluster through the proxy.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Address.description: The DNS address of the endpoint.
Address.markdownDescription:
The DNS address of the endpoint.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

Port.description: The port number on which the cluster accepts incoming connections.
Port.markdownDescription:
The port number on which the cluster accepts incoming connections.

---

Required: No  
Type: Integer  
Update requires: No interruption

EndpointCreateTime.description: The time (UTC) that the endpoint was created.
EndpointCreateTime.markdownDescription:
The time (UTC) that the endpoint was created.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

VpcSecurityGroups.description: A list of Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) security groups to be associated with the endpoint.
VpcSecurityGroups.markdownDescription:
A list of Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) security groups to be associated with the endpoint.

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption
